column2: Avya Technology Pvt. Ltd. is seeking an experienced and dynamic Senior QA Manager to lead our Quality Assurance team. The ideal candidate will have more than 10+ years of hands-on experience in software quality assurance, a proven track record of successfully managing and mentoring QA teams, and excellent communication skills.       Responsibilities        Team Leadership:Manage and lead a team of QA engineers, providing guidance, mentorship, and support to ensure their professional growth and development.     Quality Strategy: Develop and implement a comprehensive quality strategy that aligns with the company s objectives and product roadmap.     Test Planning: Create and maintain detailed test plans, test cases, and test scripts for various software projects.     Quality Assurance:Oversee the end-to-end quality assurance process, including functional, regression, performance, and security testing.     Automation:Drive automation efforts to improve testing efficiency and coverage, leveraging industry best practices and tools.     Collaboration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, product managers, and designers, to ensure the highest quality of deliverables.     Continuous Improvement:Identify areas for process improvement and implement best practices to enhance the QA process and deliverables.     Metrics and Reporting:Define and track key quality metrics, providing regular reports and insights to the executive team.     Risk Management:Identify and mitigate potential risks that could impact product quality or release timelines.     Compliance:Ensure compliance with industry standards, regulations, and best practices related to software quality and testing.     Client Coordination: Act as the point of contact for US clients, ensuring clear communication, addressing client concerns, and providing regular project updates.     Documentation: Maintain comprehensive documentation of test plans, test cases, and test results.       Qualifications        Bachelor s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. Master s degree is a plus.     Minimum of 10 years of experience in software quality assurance, with at least 5 years in a leadership or management role.     Strong knowledge of QA methodologies, tools, and best practices.     Proven experience in test planning, test case design, and test execution.     Proficiency in test automation tools and frameworks.     Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, both written and verbal.     Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.     Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
column11: Computer science, Product quality, Test scripts, Analytical, Process improvement, Test execution, Security testing, Test cases, Risk management, Software quality assurance

column2: We are looking for a Senior QA Manager who will be the single threaded leader responsible for Quality at Blink across products and lines of business     You will be responsible for defining and executing the vision of how testing should work at Blink for a continuously evolving and diverse technical landscape     This includes providing direction for key aspects like automated testing, architecting and implementing scalable testing tools, infrastructure, and test frameworks/processes that help develop, debug, test and release with confidence     You will assess risks associated with product quality and work to mitigate these risks through thorough testing, quality control measures, and proactive problem-solving     You will work closely with engineering managers, architects and product/program managers to drive a clear model of engagement and efficient division of responsibilities     You will manage a global team across India & US of Individual Contributors (QAEs, SDETs) and QA Managers as a high-performing unit     This includes mentoring, coaching and growing the team to scale to an increasing set of products and end-users, resource allocation and budgeting for the QA function, and gathering quality metrics and reporting     You will also manage stakeholder communication including but not limited to driving leadership reviews for QA across programs             About You       You have led teams and managed both individual contributors and managers.     You are comfortable with managing in-region and remote teams.     You like challenging the status quo and driving north star vision for your space.     You can prioritize across competing priorities from senior leaders/stakeholders.     You inspire your team to take on challenging goals and exceed them.     You have working experience with QA automation frameworks and testing strategies.     You have working knowledge of QA automation architecture, implementation methodologies and tools.     You are proficient in at least one dynamic programming language (like Python).     You have working knowledge of SQL.     Working experience with performance, scalability, and reliability testing methodologies is a big plus.

column2: Designation: Associate Vice President    Department : Medical Coding  Role : Quality  Job Location : Mumbai  JOB DESCRIPTION Associate Vice President of Quality is required to play a pivotal role in leading the Quality departments of the organization and providing direction to Mid & Junior level management personnel of the department. This role requires the person to play a lead strategic role, overseeing and implementing strategies that will help the Quality teams to deliver as per internal & external stake holder expectations. The person is required to have a sound and in-depth understanding of the business and should be able to make quick decisions, understands prioritization of work and ensures a high level of coaching is provided to the team.     Goal :  Maintains quality assurance program for coding resources onshore and offshore across multiple specialties to ensure adherence to timelines.  Accountable for developing and maintaining a process to identify risk and partner with training and operations to ensure quality scores exceed the service requirements. JOB PROFILE Quality Function Develop and implement a unified strategy integrating quality with, process migration, develop plans to meet  and development needs of the organization through internal and external . Develop organizational assessment methods and measurement systems to ensure quality benchmarks are met. Create a structured review mechanism for effective departmental reviews per the audit calendar and report progress. Establish and implement necessary communication strategy for improvement and awareness of quality issues across all departments. Provide leadership for the quality department, driving continuous improvement of the overall program resulting in improved funnel, quality and accuracy of customer interactions by identifying trends and trouble spots, capturing the voice of the customer and recommending appropriate actions based on data Manage the functions and work towards enhancement of the function and team members. Recruit, mentor and develop team members and nurture an environment where they can excel through encouragement and empowerment. Understanding process needs and requirements to develop & maintain effective quality control processes Drive Process improvement projects based on Six Sigma & Lean methodology     Client Communication: Assist with the preparation of the client reporting related to quality scores and associated action plans. Partners with the business unit to create a comprehensive team to support the clients and the coders. Maintains appropriate files, documents, and reports that are associated with medical billing and quality assurance. Responsible for development and management of the quality assurance program.     Required Skills: 14+ years Experience  in Medical Coding either in Operations or Quality team Managing 100+ FTEs Should be at Director or Equivalent role  The individual would have a high leadership stint in managing medium to Large sized teams Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Must enjoy digging into data and deriving insights Excellent interpersonal skills and ability to work with and influence different stakeholders across teams. Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to communicate with multiple levels within the organization. Should have excellent knowledge of MS-Office, Excel, MIS, Dashboards and Power Point Presentation Skills. Should have sound knowledge of 7 Quality tool for compiling, interpreting and communicating all quality related statistical     Educational Qualification Graduate/Post Graduate in any stream Interested candidate can mail me their profile on anandi.bandekar@gebbs.com or call on +919619814875 for further queries .

column2: Raj Fastening Solutions is currently searching for driven and skilled individuals to join our team as Incoming Quality Inspectors. We are a fast-growing company that specializes in providing high-quality fastening solutions to our clients, and we are looking for individuals who are passionate about ensuring that our products meet the highest quality standards.     As an Incoming Quality Inspector at Raj Fastening Solutions, you will be responsible for conducting thorough inspections of all incoming raw materials and finished products, ensuring that they meet our strict quality criteria before they are approved for use. You will work closely with our production team and quality assurance team to identify any issues or defects and take corrective action as needed to maintain the highest level of quality.     The ideal candidate for this position should have a strong attention to detail, excellent analytical skills, and the ability to work collaboratively as part of a team. Additionally, you should have a solid understanding of quality control processes and procedures, as well as experience working in a fast-paced manufacturing environment.
column11: Analytical skills, Quality standards, Finished products, Manager Quality Assurance, Incoming quality, Quality Inspector, Manager Quality Control

column2: We are currently seeking talented and motivated individuals to join our team as Inline Quality Inspectors. As an Inline Quality Inspector, you will be responsible for conducting detailed inspections of products as they are being manufactured, ensuring that they meet our strict quality standards throughout the production process.     At our company, we take great pride in our commitment to providing our customers with the highest quality products.      As an Inline Quality Inspector, you will play a critical role in helping us maintain this commitment by identifying any defects or issues with products as they are being manufactured, and taking immediate corrective action to ensure that they meet our rigorous quality standards.     The ideal candidate for this position will have a keen eye for detail, excellent problem-solving skills, and a deep understanding of quality control processes and procedures. Additionally, you should be able to work effectively as part of a team, and be comfortable working in a fast-paced manufacturing environment.
column11: Quality standards, Quality Inspector, Manager Quality Control
